Question: GaN Systems CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
GaN Systems

Products Highlight at CES 2024

- GaN technology applications in consumer electronics, audio, and electric vehicles showcased at CES 2024
- Demonstrating GaN in micromobility case study, extending range by 15%
- GaN Systems' leadership in power semiconductor industry with a broad portfolio of transistors addressing various industries' needs

GaN Systems, a global leader in GaN power semiconductors, will exhibit innovative GaN-powered products at CES 2024, focusing on consumer electronics, audio, and electric vehicles. The company will showcase the application of GaN technology in micromobility, extending range by 15%. Additionally, GaN Systems will demonstrate its leadership in the power semiconductor industry, offering a broad portfolio of transistors catering to the needs of various demanding industries.
